articles.description: The Initial Public Offering (IPO) of Market intelligence platform Tracxn Technologies will be closing today (Wednesday 12 October). The GMP (grey market premium) today for Tracxn technologies suggests that shares are available at a premium of Rs 8.

articles.title: "India In A Relative Bright Spot": IMF As It Cuts Global Growth - NDTV
articles.description: The IMF on Tuesday in its World Economic Outlook projected a growth rate of 6.8 per cent in 2022 as compared to 8.7 per cent in 2021 for India.
articles.content:
The IMF projected a growth rate of 6.8 per cent in 2022 for India.

articles.title: MCA approves demerger of NMDC Steel from NMDC - Moneycontrol
articles.description: In a late evening communique to bourses on October 11, NMDC said it has received the orders of the MCA on Tuesday and that it was in the process of complying with the requirements as envisaged in the ministry’s order.

articles.title: LIC market share rises to 68.24% | Business News - The Indian Express
articles.description: On the other hand, the market share of private players fell to 31.75 per cent as of September 2022 from 35.51 per cent a year ago.

articles.title: Infosys president Ravi Kumar S resigns - Hindustan Times
articles.description: "The board of directors placed on record their deep sense of appreciation for the services rendered by Ravi Kumar S. for his contributions to the company," Infosys said in a regulatory filing.
articles.content:

articles.title: IDBI Bank: Lot of value, difficult to extract - Forbes India
articles.description: The legacy-rich IDBI Bank is finally ready for a new ownership. While the bank has turned profitable and provisioned for bad loans, the tricky path to growth and becoming a retail-focussed enterprise is a challenge for the new owner
articles.content:
IDBI Bank, a subsidiary of LIC, which by legacy has been largely focussed on corporate banking, is finally up for a strategic sale from its two promoters, LIC and the Government of India (GoI).
